mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 'tb_001' ELSE CONCAT('tb_', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(store_table_code,4,3)AS DECIMAL)+1),3,0)) END AS storeTableCode FROM tb_store_table;
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN '1' ELSE CONCAT('', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(table_num,1,3)AS DECIMAL)+1),3,0)) END AS tableNum FROM tb_store_table WHERE store_code = #{storeCode};
SELECT t.store_table_code ,t.store_code ,i.store_name ,t.biz_id ,t.table_num FROM tb_store_table AS t INNER join tb_store_info AS i ON t.store_code = i.store_code WHERE t.biz_id = #{bizId};
